channel.title: Big Snow Tiny Conf - Ski getaway & conference for web business founders
channel.description:
@CasJam and I have just launched registration for the 2nd annual Big Snow Tiny Conf, a ski getaway and conference for web business founders. It takes place at Sugarbush Mountain, Vermont January 26th - 29th, 2015. Check out our new site for the details including testimonials from last year's inaugural event: [bigsnowtinyconf.com][1].
[1]: http://bigsnowtinyconf.com

item.title: Big Snow Tiny Conf - Ski getaway & conference for web business founders
item.dc:creator: Oliver
item.description:
I’d be there except the East Coast is a little too far!

The idea is great though. Not to hijack your thread but would anybody be interested in doing something similar out West?

Read full topic
item.source: Big Snow Tiny Conf - Ski getaway & conference for web business founders

item.title: Big Snow Tiny Conf - Ski getaway & conference for web business founders
item.dc:creator: CasJam
item.description:
Yes Yes.

It was a blast last year. Half the day on the slopes, the rest of the time talking business, sharing ideas, and getting advice with likeminded founders.

We only have 10 spots available and several are already spoken for, so if you’d like to make it, now’s the time to book!

Read full topic
item.source: Big Snow Tiny Conf - Ski getaway & conference for web business founders
